title: Arrow Swipe Run X
creator: Run And Gun Free Android Games

extendedInfo.description: Arrow Swipe Run X - super fun and simple game play that will keep you happy for hours. Arrows and jewels are falling from the sky, swipe quick to catch them all.NEW UPDATE:- Now includes world top players score board- Players can unlock wave bombs for free by collecting gem star jewelsâ Awesome game play and simple control inputâ Cool plasma style art and retro musicâ Improve your skills in other swipe input game like Temple Run 2 / Brave / Oz and Subway Surfersâ 2 player match mode with friendsâ Unlock the wave bombs to destroy the arrows and get even furtherâ Great old retro style gameSOME PLAYER REVIEWSAwesomeness âââââ "10000000 points haha. I don't like all games but this one was so freakin awesome I loved it if I could it would get ten stars."by pug wind lover- Version 1.5 - Dec 19, 2012 (iPhone)Simple but Cool âââââ "I see how it ties into temple run dash style and I think it's pretty neat. Hope you keep updating it to eventually make a in game shop. its smooth running on my xperia :D"by fred de pacman - Version 1.5 - Jan 2, 2013 (iPhone)HOW TO PLAYYour quest is to get highest score possible. When the arrows fall between the 2 white line at the bottom of the screen, then swipe in the direction of the arrow with your finger. You can swipe anywhere on the screen. If you miss an arrow it is game over unless you unlock the wave bombs. Arrows fall faster and faster so you'll need nimble fingers.In two player mode, the first person to miss an arrow loses the match.Wave bombs run up the screen and destroy arrows, collect as many gem star jewels as possible and unlock the bombs in the shop. You can also get packs of jewels for free by downloading another game in the tapjoy offer wall. Just tap on 'Get Free Gem Star Jewels' in the shop.Please show your support by downloading and rating the game.Have fun arrow runner :)Notes: original game name was 'temple run training'
